text: vāṉaṅkaḷilum, pūmiyilum uḷḷavai (aṉaittum) allāhvukkē uriyaṉa. Iṉṉum, uṅkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷil iruppatai nīṅkaḷ veḷippaṭuttiṉālum, allatu atai nīṅkaḷ maṟaittālum, allāh ataip paṟṟi uṅkaḷaik kaṇakku kēṭpāṉ - iṉṉum, tāṉ nāṭiyavarai maṉṉippāṉ; tāṉ nāṭiyavarai vētaṉaiyum ceyvāṉ - allāh aṉaittup poruṭkaḷ mītum caktiyuṭaiyavaṉ
